meanings.definition: A membrane surrounding the vacuole in plant cells.
meanings.sent1: The tonoplasts protect the vacuole in plant cells.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the tonoplasts to understand how plant cells function.
meanings.sent3: The tonoplasts in the plant cell were like a fortress guarding the precious vacuole.
meanings.sent4: The tonoplasts acted as a shield, shielding the vacuole from harm.
meanings.sent5: The tonoplasts, like a bodyguard, ensure the safety of the vacuole within the plant cell.
